GK16visa02cu:368: hetuṃ vināpi yasya kasyacitsaṃbandhino lakṣaṇo 'tiprasaṅgaḥ syāt,
GK16visa02cu:383: rūḍhiprayojanaśūnyā, lakṣaṇā tu neyārtha iti vakṣyate, sā ca kāvye
GK16visa02cu:391: ayamarthaḥ--gaṅgadiśabdo yasmāt jalamayādirūpamevārthaṃ samayasmaraṇākātaraḥ san smārayati, tasmād vācyarūpasya jalādyarthasya
GK16visa02cu:392: ghoṣādyarthena sahānvayānupapattyā prakṛte vācakatvena tasya prayogo na ghaṭata iti /
GK16visa02cu:395: sambandhasyānvayasya, taddhi taṭaśabdārthaṃ yayā bodhayatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:396: bhaṭṭamate svābhāvikī abhidhā, tadanyā padasya śaktirvyāpāraḥ,
GK16visa02cu:401: pūrvatra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika ityatra, uttaratra gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa ityādau
GK16visa02cu:402: gaṅgātaṭa ityādau taṭasya gaṅgāśabdena pratipādanāt gaṅgātādātmyapratīteḥ gaṅgārthaniṣṭānāṃ naṭārthaniṣṭhātiśayitānāṃ śītatvapāvanatvādīnāṃ pratītirlakṣaṇāyāḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:410: vyutpattilabhyasya mukhyārthatve “gauḥ śete” ityatrāpi lakṣaṇā syāt /
GK16visa02cu:416: dakṣasyaiva mukhyārthatvāditi---bhūriprayogeṇa dakṣatvasya laghutvena ca tadacchinnasyaiva śakyatvena mukhyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:419: tathā ca tenaiva nimittena śabdasya pravṛttestadavacchinna eva mukhyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:420_0: lakṣyārthe kvacit prayogastu tātparyyaviśeṣasatve eva; yathā dakṣe śaktasya kuśalapadasya gṛhaviśeṣe śaktasya maṇḍapapadasya
GK16visa02cu:420_1: ca daivakarmaṇi kuśala iti rogī maṇḍapa iti ca tayodavakarmarogipadasamabhivyāharasya tātparyyagrāhakatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:421: gauḥ śete ityatra śete iti suptagoḥ- pradarśanārthameva /
GK16visa02cu:422: gaurastīti suptagavi prayoge 'pi lakṣaṇā syāditi bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:426: “uṇādayo bahulam'; iti sūtreṇa vadataḥ pāṇineḥ ayamabhiprāyo yaduṇādipratyayānāṃ prāyikyeva vyutpattiriti, tathā ca na tayā prayogaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:427: tathā ca gotvenaiva rūpeṇa rūḍhiśaktyā gopadaṃ svapadagacchad gosādhāraṇyena prayujyate, na uṇādi-pratyayavyutpattyā iti /
GK16visa02cu:433: gośabdo yadyapi gamanārtho vyutpattinimittaṃ tathāpi gotvāpattikiyaiva pravṛttinimittam ata eva gacchatyāgacchati gavi gośabdaprayogaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:436: tadbhedāniti;--tayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanābhyāṃ dvidhoktayorlakṣaṇayorbhedān viśeṣān bhidyate 'nena iti bheda iti vyutpattyā /
GK16visa02cu:447_0: atra tātparyyaviṣayatvaṃ yadi anvayaviśeṣaṇaṃ na kriyate tadā chatriṇe gacchanti kuntāḥ praviśanti ityādiṣu avyāptiḥ syāt;
GK16visa02cu:457: anayorhi śvetādibhiḥ kuntādibhiścācetanatayā kevalairdhāvanapraveśanakriyayoḥ kartṛtayānvayamalabhamānairetatsiddhaye ātmasambandhino 'śvādayaḥ puruṣāda yaścākṣipyante /
GK16visa02cu:461: kuntā iti kuntavanta ityarthaḥ anayormukhyārthānvayabādhaṃ darśayati
GK16visa02cu:463: śvetādibhirityādipadāt nīlādiguṇānāṃ kuntādibhirityādi padāt astrāntarāṇāṃ ca parigrahaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:468: aśvādaya ityādipadacchvetagavādeḥ, puruṣādayaḥ ityādipadāt kuntadhārivat itarasya parigrahaḥ
GK16visa02cu:482: (lo, au) mukhyārtheti---mukhyābhidheyor'thaḥ tasya itaraḥ prakṛtanirvāhaupāyikaḥ, tasyākṣepaḥ ākṛṣya upanayanam /
GK16visa02cu:492: atra arpaṇamityatra paratraiveti śeṣaḥ, svasya paramātraviṣayatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:494: upādānalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu mukhyārthasyāpi viṣayatā iti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:496: tathā ca vākyārthe bodhye parasya amukhyārthasya anvayasiddhaye anvayabodhāya yasyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ svasya arpaṇaṃ paramātraviṣayatā; eṣā lakṣaṇalakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:506: atra kaliṅgaḥ sāhasika iti na pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:507: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:509: ubhayatraiva mukhyārthaṃ kaliṅgarūpaṃ deśaṃ pravāharūpāṃ saṅgā ca vihāya taddeśasthapuruṣatattīrayoḥ
GK16visa02cu:515: kaliṅgagaṅgāśabdau ityatra kaliṅgagaṅgāśabādapadaṃ tanniṣṭhalakṣaṇādvayaparaṃ yathā vyākhyātārthanusāreṇa bodhyam /
GK16visa02cu:521: “apakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate sujanatā prathitā bhavatā param /
GK16visa02cu:522: vidadhadīdṛśameva sadā sakhe ! sukhitamāssva tataḥ śaradāṃ śatam” //
GK16visa02cu:530: tvayā bahu upakṛtaṃ tatra kimucyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:537: kintu apakāradurjanatvalakṣaṇayoḥ phalaṃ sambodhyasya kauṭilyaṃ duḥ khitalakṣaṇāyāstu kauṭilyaphalatvam
GK16visa02cu:551: viṣayiṇā anigīrṇasya viṣayasya tenaiva saha tādātmyapratītikṛtsāropā /
GK16visa02cu:556: tasya anigārṇṇasya anācchāditasya arthāt svavācakanāmapadena uktasya anyatādātmyaṃ śakyārthābhedaḥ
GK16visa02cu:558: nigīrṇṇasya viśiṣya svāvācaka-nāmapadena anuktasya tu sādhyavasānikā
GK16visa02cu:561: tatpratītikṛcca yadyapi samānavibhaktikapadadvayameva, na tu lakṣaṇā;
GK16visa02cu:565: ākhyātena lakṣyārthasyoktau tat pratīteḥ; taccāgre darśayiṣyate /
GK16visa02cu:567: (lo, i) evaṃ caturvidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ sāropā sādhyavasānā
GK16visa02cu:571: evaṃ svaśabdārthanāmnā gatārthe 'pi sphuṭīkaraṇāya lakṣaṇena nirddiśati--viṣayasyeti /
GK16visa02cu:591: svasamaveta ityanena samavāyarūpasya lakṣaṇāhetoḥ svasambandhasya nigaraṇaṃ śvetaguṇa āropyamāṇaḥ
GK16visa02cu:592: prayojana ityanantaraṃ pūrvoktā upādānalakṣaṇā sāropeti anuṣajyate /
GK16visa02cu:614: (vi, va) kaliṅgaḥ puruṣa iti---atra puruṣapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt anigīrṇṇatvam /
GK16visa02cu:620: āyuridamiti sādhyavasānāyamavyabhicāra iti dvayoḥ pṛthak prayojanadvayamuktam /
GK16visa02cu:621: kāryyakāraṇabhāvarūpasambandhena sāropāṃ lakṣaṇāmuktvā sambandhāntarairapi tāṃ darśayati---rājarkāyetīti
GK16visa02cu:622: atra asāvitipadena lakṣyārthe puruṣe nirddiṣṭe rājño 'bhedāropāt
GK16visa02cu:631: (vi, śa) itthaṃ sāropāmuktvā “nigīrṇṇasya matā sādhyavasānikā'; iti kārikāñcalaṃ vyācaṣṭe-nigīrṇṇasya punariti /
GK16visa02cu:632: asyāścaturṣviti rūḍhiprayojanadvaye upādānalakṣaṇādvayaṃ taddvaye lakṣaṇalakṣaṇādvayaṃ ceti sādhyavasānāyaścatvārobhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:633_0: pūrvodāharaṇānyeveti rūḍhāvupādānalakṣaṇāyāḥ---”śveto dhāvati'; iti prayojane upādānalakṣaṇāyāḥ “kuntāḥ praviśanti'; iti
GK16visa02cu:633_1: yaddvayamudāhṛtaṃ rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāḥ “kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti'; iti prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇāyāṃ tu rājakīye puruṣe
GK16visa02cu:633_2: gacchati “rājāsau gacchati'; iti yadudāhṛtaṃ tatra idaṃ padatyāgena udāharaṇamityata etāni catvāri sādhyavasānāyā udāharaṇānītyarthaḥ
GK16visa02cu:634: eteṣu caturṣu hi kartryā khyātenaiva kartṛlakṣyārthasya upasthāpanāt nāmapadena tu anupasthānānnigīrṇṇatā
GK16visa02cu:637: gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣa iti tu lakṣaṇalakṣaṇodāharaṇaṃ yaddarśetaṃ tattu na sādhyavasānodāharaṇam /
GK16visa02cu:639: evaṃ ca rūḍhau lakṣaṇalakṣaṇedāharaṇaṃ kaliṅga ityādikaṃ yaduktaṃ tatra sāhasika iti prāmādikaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:640: nāmapadena sāhasika ityanena lakṣyārthasya puruṣasyopādānāt sāropatvena sādhyavasānatvābhāvāt
GK16visa02cu:641: kintu kaliṅgaḥ sāhasaṃ karoti ityeva tatra pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:642: itthamupādānalakṣaṇālakṣaṇalakṣaṇayoḥ rūḍhiprayojanahetukatvena caturvidhayoḥ sāropāsādhyavasānikārūpatvena dvaiguṇyāt aṣṭavidhatvam /
GK16visa02cu:644: (lo, u) evamārope rūḍhiprayojanayorudāharaṇe catuṣṭayaṃ darśayitvā viṣayavyāptyarthaṃ sambandhabhedena
GK16visa02cu:645: vetyādi---rājāsau ityatra pūrvavat adaḥ śabdena viṣayaprakaṭanam /
GK16visa02cu:647: atra hastāvayave 'gre 'pi hastaśabdaprayogaḥ, ekadeśadāhe 'pi grāmo dagdha iti vat /
GK16visa02cu:648: atra idaṃśabdo rājā asau ityatra ca adaḥ śabdavat /
GK16visa02cu:656: sādṛśyetarasambandhāḥ kāryyakāraṇabhāvādirūpāḥ pūrvadarśitāḥ sakalā aṣṭavidhā api suddhāḥ śuddhaparibhāṣitāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:657: sādṛśyasambandhāttu tā aṣṭavidhā gauṇyaḥ sādṛśyaghaṭakarūpaśakyaguṇayogarūpayogārthena gauṇyo gauṇīparibhāṣitā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:660: (lo ū) evamaṣṭavidhāpi lakṣaṇā pratyekaṃ śuddhā gauṇī ceti
GK16visa02cu:667: (vi, sa) pūrvoktodāharaṇānyeva iti---śveto dhāvatītyādīni, indrārthā sthūṇā ityantāni sakalāni eva /
GK16visa02cu:671: atra tailaśabdastilabhavasneharūpaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva sārṣapādiṣu sneheṣu vartate /
GK16visa02cu:673: (lo, ṛ) etānīti---atra tailaśabdasya tilabhavastrehamātravācakatvāt prakṛte tasya kevalasya sukhamayatvādivivakṣaṇat mukhyārthabādaḥ;
GK16visa02cu:674: prayojanābhāvāt rūḍiḥ upādānalakṣaṇātvaṃ mukhyārthamupādāyaiva iti vṛttyā smāritam /
GK16visa02cu:675: streheṣu varttata ityanena ubhayoḥ streharūpatvāt sādṛśyalakṣaṇaḥ sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:678: rājakumāreṣu tatsadṛśeṣu ca gacchatsu”ete rājakumārā gacchanti” /
GK16visa02cu:681: tilasyedamiti yogārthavaśāttasya mukhyārthatvaṃ, tasya cikkaṇatākāritvena sādṛśyāśrayaṃ śakyalakṣyobhayamevātra taila śabdārtha
GK16visa02cu:685: ubhayatraiva etāni ete iti sarvanāmapadena lakṣyārthopādānāt tatra śakyārthatādātmyāropācca sāropā lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:692: atra sarvanāmapadena lakṣyārthānupasthāpanānna sāropā, kintu śakyārthāvyāvarttakena śakyalakṣyasādhāraṇyena sukhapadena lakṣyārthopasthāpanāttasyācchādanarūpā nigīrṇṇatā /
GK16visa02cu:702: atra duḥ khadāyitvena kaṇṭakasadṛśaḥ gauḍendro lakṣyārthaḥ svaśabdenaivopāttaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:715: takṣyārthasya kenāpi padena anupasthāpanāt, prathamaṃ tatra śakyatādātmyāropānupapatteḥ
GK16visa02cu:716: kintu rājñā kaṇṭakaṃ śodhyate, ityeva pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:717: tatra karmākhyātenopasthāpite śodhye karmaṇi vaurīṇi prathamāntakaṇṭapadaśakyārthasya tādātmyāropāt
GK16visa02cu:731: gaurvāhīka ityādietasmin udāharaṇe yathā prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sāropā gauṇī /
GK16visa02cu:733: evaṃ gaurjalpatītyatrāpi prayojane lakṣaṇalakṣaṇā sādhyavasānā gauṇī
GK16visa02cu:740: (vi, ga) atra keciditi---svārtho gotvaṃ tatsahacāriṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:743: tathā ca jaḍatvena rūpeṇa vāhīkaḥ śaktyaiva, jaḍo vāhīka iti
GK16visa02cu:746: ayaṃ ca doṣaḥ tat siddhāntānavakalenādeva dharme lakṣaṇayā eva dharmiṇi śaktigrāhakatvasya taiḥ siddhāntitatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:747: gośabdārtheti---sakṛduccāritasya śabdasya sakṛdarthabodhanena śabdavirityā abhidhāyā api virateriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:750: vṛtterlakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaṃ darśayan ekatrāpi udāharaṇe vipratipattinirāsena sarvamapi sāmañjasyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha--atreti /
GK16visa02cu:751_0: gaurvāhīka ityatra svārtho gauḥ; lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante te tatra lakṣitā guṇāḥ; cakāreṇa na khalu teṣāṃ lakṣitatvamātreṇa
GK16visa02cu:751_1: viśrantiriti, vāhīkārthasyābhidhāne 'bhidhayā bodane nimittībhavanti punarutthānābhāvāt śabdabuddhikarmmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāva
GK16visa02cu:752: anye ca punargauśabdena vāhīkārtho nābhidhīyate, kintu svārthasahacāriguṇasājātyena vāhīkārthagatā guṇā eva lakṣyante /
GK16visa02cu:755: (vi, gha) guṇā eva lakṣyanta iti---vāhīkapratītistvākṣepāditi bhāvaḥ
GK16visa02cu:760: sājātyena sambandhena vāhīkagatā guṇā jāḍyamāndyādaya eva ;
GK16visa02cu:762: lakṣyante lakṣaṇayā bodhyante tat samanantaroktaṃ matāntaramapi /
GK16visa02cu:764: atra gośabdādvāhīkārthaḥ pratīyate, na vā ? ādye gośabdādeva vā ?
GK16visa02cu:765: lakṣitādvā guṇād ? avinābhāvādvā ? tatra, na prathamaḥ, vāhīkārthe
GK16visa02cu:777: yadi hi gośabdādvāhīkārtho na pratīyate, tadāsya vāhīkaśabdasya ca
GK16visa02cu:785: vastutastu jātiśaktivāde jātyavinābhāvalabhyāyā vyakteḥ śābdabodhapraveśavadatrāpi tathātve bādhakābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:794: tasmādatra gośabdo mukhyayāvṛttyā vāhīkaśabdena sahānvayamalabhamāno 'jñatvādisādharmyasaṃbandhādvāhīkārthaṃ lakṣayati /
GK16visa02cu:797: (vi, ca) tathā hi gośabdasya vāhīkagatajāḍyamāndyādi guṇor'thaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:807: vāhīko 'jña iti svaśabdapratipādanālabhyam, etasyā gauṇyākhyāyā vṛttermukhyārthabādhāditritayahetukatvāt lakṣaṇāyāmantarbhāvaḥ sphuṭa eva ityāśayaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:809_0: gaurvāhīka ityatra govāhīkaśabdayostādātmyapratītyā vāhīke jāḍyādyatiśayaḥ pratīyate iti vyartho 'yamupacāro lakṣaṇāyāsaḥ
GK16visa02cu:810_0: tathāhi sādṛśyasambandhinoriva taditarasambandhinorna sambandhaudāsīnyena vṛttiḥ; ata evānyairuktasambandhāntaraṃ lakṣyalakṣyakayoḥ
GK16visa02cu:810_1: sākṣāt sambandhena, sādṛśyaṃ tu gaurvāhīkāditaddharmasājātyarūpaṃ, na tatheti, ata eva kvacit taṭādau gaṅgadisambandhāt kiñcit
GK16visa02cu:810_2: śetyādikamastvevaṃ, kintu gaṅgāśabdena pratipādane gaṅgātvapratītau tatśaityādikamādhikaṃ pratīyate /
GK16visa02cu:811: vāhīke punargoniṣṭānāṃ guṇānāṃ kadācinna sambhavaḥ, kintu tatsajātīyānām /
GK16visa02cu:812: kiñca gaurvāhīka ityukte 'pi pratipattuḥ sarvathā nābhedapratipattiḥ,
GK16visa02cu:814_0: taduktaṃ śārīrikamīmāṃsāvyākhyāne vācaspatimiśraiḥ---”api ca paraśabdaḥ paratra lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogena varttata'; iti yatra
GK16visa02cu:814_1: prayoktṛpratipattroḥ sampratipattiḥ sa gauṇaḥ, saca bhedapratyayapuraḥ sara iti /
GK16visa02cu:817: upacāro hi nāmātyantaṃ viśakalitayoḥ śabdayoḥ sādṛśyātiśayamahimnā bhedapratītisthaganamātram
GK16visa02cu:819: śuklapaṭayostu nātyantaṃ bhedapratītiḥ, tasmādevamādiṣu śuddhaiva lakṣaṇā
GK16visa02cu:827: śauddhatvaprayojakaṃ, kintu tatraiva sādṛśyasattve eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:830: (lo, a) etadabhipretya uktaprakāreṇa lakṣaṇāviśeṣaṇayorgauṇaśuddhayorbhedaṃ darśayatiiyaṃ ceti /
GK16visa02cu:832: upacāro nāma atyantaṃ viśakalitayorityanena sambandhasya sākṣāttvaṃ darśitam /
GK16visa02cu:836: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā lakṣaṇā daśitāstāḥ prayojanarūpavyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatayā pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā ṣoḍhaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:847: prayojane yā aṣṭabhedā darśitā iti ṣoḍaśasu rūḍhāvaṣṭau prayojane tvaṣṭāviti darśatatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:849: upakṛtamiti---atra granthakṛnmate 'pakāradyatiśayaḥ, anyamate tvapakāriṇaḥ kauṭilyādikaṃ prayojanaṃ, vyaṅgyavidagdhaikagamam /
GK16visa02cu:854: kāvyaprakāśe tu śikṣādānameva lakṣyārthastatrānāyāsa eva prayojanamabhidheyavat sarvajanavedyam
GK16visa02cu:855: taddhi prayonajamupadeśasya vākyārthasya dharmo lakṣyārthe śikṣādāne
GK16visa02cu:856: pratīyate---upadeśāt śikṣāyāṃ cānāyāsaḥ sarvajanavedya eva iti tadabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:861: ābhyāmeva vyaṅgyasya gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyākhyau kāvyaprakāraviśeṣau vakṣyete
GK16visa02cu:863: etā anantaroktāḥ ṣoḍaśabhedā lakṣaṇāḥ phalasya dharmigatatvena dharmagatatvena ca pratyekaṃ dvidhā bhūtvā dvātriṃśadbhedāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:865: “strigdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyato velladvalākā ghanā vātāḥ śīkariṇaḥ payodasuhṛdāmānandakekāḥ kalāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:866: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
GK16visa02cu:873: payodasuhṛdāṃmayūrāṇām ete virahoddīpakāḥ kāmaṃ svācchandyena santu tathāpi māṃ mārayituṃ na śaktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:874: yato rāmo 'smi, duḥ khasahiṣṇurasmi, tathātve hetumāhakaṭhoreti /
GK16visa02cu:875: ata uktaṃ ghanādikaṃ sarvamahaṃ sahe ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:880: atrātyantaduḥkhasahiṣṇurūpe rāme dharmiṇi lakṣye tasyaivātiśayaḥ phalam /
GK16visa02cu:885: tasyaivātiśaya iti tasyaiva duḥ khasahiṣṇo rāmasyātiśayaḥ
GK16visa02cu:886: vipralambharūpaḥ, nacātra duḥ khasahiṣṇutvasyāpyatiśayaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16visa02cu:887: tat kathamidaṃ dharmagatasyodāharaṇaṃ na darśitamiti vācyam /
GK16visa02cu:888: vivakṣitārthāvivekena tasyāpi dharmigatvādeva; tathāhi duḥ khasahiṣṇutvaṃ tāvadduḥ khadveṣābhāvastasya
GK16visa02cu:894: atra cātiśayitāṃśo nātiprayojanaḥ sampātāyāta eva bodhyaḥ nanvatra dharmigate śītatvapāvanatve eva prayojane kiṃ na syāditicenna /
GK16visa02cu:896: tataśca lakṣaṇayā taṭapratītau tatsambandhinoḥ tayoḥ smaraṇasyaivaṃ sambhavena vyaṅgyatvaniyamarahitayostayoratiśaya eva prayojanamityabhiprāyāt /
GK16visa02cu:900: atreti--ayamarthaḥ; rāmo 'haṃ sarvaṃ saha ityatra rāmasya
GK16visa02cu:902: tena phalāt atyantaduḥ khasahiṣṇū rāmo 'smi iti śabdābhidhānālabhyaṃ tathābhūtarāmaviśeṣasya evātiśayastanniṣṭameva prayojanamiti /
GK16visa02cu:915: gūḍhāgūḍhatvābhyāṃ draiguṇyena ṣoḍaśavidhasya dharmidharmagatatvena dvaiguṇyād dvātriṃśadityarthaḥ
GK16visa02cu:917: gaṅgāyāmiti--nanvidamapi ghoṣanvayavaśāt vākyameva yadi ca vākyasthaikapadasyaiva lākṣaṇikatvāttadvyaṅgyasya padagatatvaṃ tadā upakṛtaṃ bahvityatrāpi na vākyagatatvam /
GK16visa02cu:918: upakṛtaṃ bahu tatra kimucyate iti vākyasthasyopakṛtapadasya ekasyaiva lakṣaṇikatvāditi cenna
GK16visa02cu:921: naca kimucyate ityantasya bhinnavākyatvāt kathaṃ tayorekavākyatvamiti
GK16visa02cu:926: evameva hi dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyadoṣaguṇālaṅkārāṇāṃ vākyaniṣṭatvam prācīnālaṅkāragranthaṣvapi prayaśo dṛśyate /
GK16visa02cu:934: “śabdabuddhikarmaṇāṃ viramya vyāpārābhāvaḥ” iti nayenābhidhālakṣaṇātātparyākhyāsu tisṛṣu vṛttiṣu svaṃ svamarthaṃ
GK16visa02cu:935: bodhayitvopakṣīṇāsu yathā aparo 'nyo 'nyor'tho bodhyate sā śabdasyārthasya
GK16visa02cu:941: etannyāyāt śabdasyeva tanniṣṭhavṛtterapi viratiḥ siddhyati ityarthaḥ
GK16visa02cu:948: tatrāpi lakṣaṇāyā abhāve tu prathamamate tu dvayoḥ dvitīyamate tvekasyāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:957_0: (vi, ḍa) anekārthasyeti---saṃyogādīn vakṣyati, tairanekārthasya śabdasya ekārthe niyantrite arthāntarabodhaṃ pratirudhya
GK16visa02cu:957_1: bodhite sati anyasya pratiruddhārthasya dhiyo heturyā vṛttiḥ sā vyañjanābhidhāśrayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:963: anyasya saṃyogādisācivyābhāvāt abhidhāyā aviṣayasya buddhihetuḥ vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:973: sāhacaryyaṃ-samabhivyāhṛtapadārthena saha sarvadā sthitiḥ virodhitā vairitā sāpi tādṛśāparapadārthena saha /
GK16visa02cu:985: etanmate tu yasya padārthasyānvayabodhastasyaiva viśeṣasya smaraṇamiti /
GK16visa02cu:987: (lo, ṛ) uktaṃ hi bhartṛhariṇā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1011: “bhāti rathāṅgam” rathāṅgam” iti napuṃsakavyaktyā rathāṅgaṃ cakram /
GK16visa02cu:1012: svarastu veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛnna kāvya iti tasya viṣayo nodāhṛtaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1025: naca kāmadevasyāpi kopa iti vācyam, virahiṇyāṃ kupati ityarthāt /
GK16visa02cu:1028: sāmarthye madhuneti---atra madhurdaityaviśeṣe 'pi, kokilamādane vasantasyaiva sāmarthyam /
GK16visa02cu:1038: tayoḥ śaṅvacakrayorviyoge 'bhāve 'pi tameva harimevābhidhatte ityanuṣajyate, pratiṣedhasya prasaktipūrvakatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1041: atra vadhyaghātako virodhaḥ, sahānavasthāne tu chāyātapāviti /
GK16visa02cu:1044: kāmo na tu makarākāro dhvajaḥ, tasya koparūpadharmābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1047: sānnidhyaṃ na tu vadanaṃ, tasya kāmakātaratāyogyatvābhāvāt śaśī na tu karpūram /
GK16visa02cu:1050: veda eva viśeṣapratītikṛt iti anekārthavācakaśabdasya ekārthavācakatve niyantraṇarūpaḥ, tatpratyayaṃ ca svaro vede eva karoti /
GK16visa02cu:1051: yathā indraśatrurityādau ṣaṣṭītatpuruṣe samāsāntodāttasūcite indrasya śamīyatā vā daityo 'rirevābhidhīyate
GK16visa02cu:1052: bahuvrīhau tu pūrvapadāntodāttanirṇote indra eva śamayitā śātayitā ceti /
GK16visa02cu:1056: udāttādirūpo 'pi muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśā śṛṅgārādirasaviśeṣapratītikṛdeva” iti etadviṣaye udāharaṇamucitameva iti, tanna; tathāhi--
GK16visa02cu:1057: svarāḥ kākkādayaḥ udāttādayo vā vyaṅgyarūpameva viśeṣaṃ pratyāyanti, na khalu prakṛtoktamanekārthaśabdasyaikārthaniyantraṇarūpaṃ viśeṣam /
GK16visa02cu:1075: anekārthe ityādau arthaśabdo vācyaparaḥ, viśeṣa ityanantaraṃ saṃyogādiprayogāditi śeṣaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1076: kiñca yadi yatra kvacidanekārthaśabdānāṃ prakaraṇādiniyamābhāvādaniyantritayorapyarthayoranurūpasvaravaśenaikatra niyamanaṃ vācyaṃ, tadā tathāvidhasthale śleṣānaṅgīkāraprasaṅgaḥ;
GK16visa02cu:1078: (vi, ta) muneḥ pāṭhoktadiśeti--muninā vedasya svaraviśeṣeṇaiva paṭhanāt /
GK16visa02cu:1084: ekārthaniyamane 'nyārthasya vyaṅgyatvena tasyopamānatvāt upamādhvanitvasyaiva prasakternatu śleṣasya /
GK16visa02cu:1085: yathā vakṣyamāṇe durgālaṅghitavigrahe ityādau prakaraṇādumāmahādevīvallabhabhānudevarājaniyamane pārvatīvallabhasya vyaṅgyatvena rājñaḥ tadupamādhvanireva /
GK16visa02cu:1086: na ca tathā, ata evāhuḥ śleṣanirūpaṇaprastāve--
GK16visa02cu:1087: “kāvyamārge svaro na gaṇyate” itica nayaḥ, ityalamupajīvyānaṃ mānyānāṃ vyākhyāneṣu kaṭākṣanikṣepeṇa
GK16visa02cu:1091: (lo e) evaṃ pracīnoktaṃ dūṣayitvā svayameva pūrvapakṣamutpādya nirācaṣṭe-kiñceti /
GK16visa02cu:1093: “yena dhvastamanobhavena valijitkāyaḥ purā strīkṛto yaścodvṛttabhujaṅgahāravalayogaṃgāṃ ca yo 'dhārayat /
GK16visa02cu:1094: yasyāhuḥ śaśimat śiro hara iti stutyaṃ ca nāmāmarāḥ pāyāt sa svayamandhakakṣayakarastvāṃ sarvadomādhavaḥ”
GK16visa02cu:1095: ityādau dvayorapyarthayorhariharastutiparayoranurūpaḥ svara udāttādirekatra harau hare vā
GK16visa02cu:1126: nakṣatreśakṛ tekṣaṇo girigurau gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan gāmākramya vibhūtibhūṣitatanū rājatyumāvallabhaḥ”
GK16visa02cu:1132: atra umā nāma mahādevī tasyā vallabho bhānudevanṛpatiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1135: tejasā dehakāntyā manasijaṃ sammīlayan sāndairyyagavārta saṅkocayan /
GK16visa02cu:1139: kṣatraiśeṣu kṣatriyeśvareṣu rājasu avajñayā na kṛtekṣaṇo akṛtadṛkpātaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1140: gurau mahatyāṃ giri vāci, gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ prītiṃ dhārayan gāmākramya pṛthivīmadhikṛtya, vibhūtyā aiśvaryyeṇa bhūṣitatanuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1141: atra durgādipadānyanekārthāni prakaraṇavaśāddarśitārthe niyantrite vācakāni (śabdāḥ) arthāntaraṃ tu vyañjanayā bodhayanti /
GK16visa02cu:1142: tathā hi--umāyāḥ pārvatyā vallabho maheśo rājati /
GK16visa02cu:1149: girīṇāṃ gurau himālaye gāḍhāṃ ruciṃ dhārayan śvaśuratvāt svīyataponilayatvācca /
GK16visa02cu:1152: itthamatrāprākaraṇike maheśe vyañjite prakṛte saṅgamanāya maheśa iva rājetyupamāvyañjanādupamādhvanirayam
GK16visa02cu:1154_0: (lo, ai) durgālaṅghiteti---durgāṇi vanagirijalamayasthānāni durgā pārvatī ca, alaṅghito laṅghitaśca, vigraho yuddhaṃ dehaśca,
GK16visa02cu:1154_1: sammīlanaṃ tiraskāro dahanaṃ ca, tejaḥ kānti. nayanāgniśca rājā pārthivaścandraśca /
GK16visa02cu:1155: kalā kalanāṃ aṃśaśca, garimā mahimā aiśvaryyaviśeṣaśca /
GK16visa02cu:1160: girīṇāṃ gurau, śreṣṭe ca gāṃ pṛthivīṃ vṛṣabhaṃ ca /
GK16visa02cu:1164: iha ca umāvallabhaśabdena yo 'yamaprakṛto maheśvarārthaḥ pratīyate tasyāsambaddhatvamāsīditi maheśvarabhānudevayorupamānopameyabhāvaḥ kalpyate /
GK16visa02cu:1166: ityatrai vakārasyāyamāśayaḥ-iha khalūmāvallabhaśabde yeyaṃ dvitīyārthapratītiḥ tatrābhidhāyā prakṛtārthamātrabodhane viramāt lakṣaṇāyāśca mukhyārthabodhahetukatvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1170: ataśca prathamamumāvallabhādiśabdena rājārthabodhanād viratāyāṃ prathamābhidhāyāṃ dvitīyaḥ śabdaḥ tanniṣṭābhidhāśaktyā dvitīyārthaṃ bodhayatu kiṃ vṛttyantarakalpanayā iti cenna /
GK16visa02cu:1171: atra hi śabdadvayakalpane kathaṃ prakṛtārthasya prathamaṃ
GK16visa02cu:1173: evaṃ”bhramimaratim”ityādāvapi viṣaśabdasya garalārthatve bhujaṅgādipadasācivyāt na panarabhidhāyā ujjīvanaṃ, kintu vyañjanaiva vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1179_0: durgālaṅghitetyādau ca dvitīyārthasyānubhavasiddhasyābhāvaṃ vadato mahimācāryyasya gajanimīlikaiva durvyākhyātṛdurupadeśaparamparayaiva
GK16visa02cu:1181: kiñca dvitīyārthabodhane dharmikalpanāto varaṃ dharmakalpaneti bhinnaśabdakalpanāt bhinnā eva vyañjanākhyā vṛttiraṅgīkarttumucitā ;
GK16visa02cu:1182: tasyāstu yatra tatra prasare 'tiprasaṅgabhītyā sambandhatvena saivābhidhāśrīyata iti sarvamavadātam
GK16visa02cu:1185: yayā pratyāyyate sā syādvyañjanā lakṣaṇāśrayā // VisSd_2.15 //
GK16visa02cu:1188: upāsyate ādriyate, yasya kṛte yannimittam yathā śabdaśaktyā /
GK16visa02cu:1189: “gaṅgāyāṃ ghoṣaḥ” ityādau jalamayādyarthabodhanādabhidhāyāṃ taṭādyarthabodhanācca lakṣaṇāyāṃ viratāyāṃ yayā śītatvapāvanatvādyatiśayādirbodhyate sā lakṣaṇāmūlā vyañjanā /
GK16visa02cu:1199: (lo, au) prakaraṇasaṅgatimāha evamiti--bodhyate yaḥ sa boddhavyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1202: ucyate śabdena pratipādyate yaḥ sa vācyaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1204: prastāvaḥ prakaraṇaṃ, kākuḥ dhvanervikāraḥ, vaiśiṣṭyāt vailakṣaṇyāditi vaktrādiṣu pratyekamanvayaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1207: “kālo madhuḥ kupita eṣa ca puṣpadhanvā dhīrā vahanti ratikhedaharāḥ samīrāḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1208: kelīvanīyamapi vañjulakuñjamañjur- dūre patiḥ kathaya kiṃ karaṇīyamadya”
GK16visa02cu:1209: atraitaṃ deśaṃ prati śīghraṃ pracchannakāmukastvayā preṣyatāmiti sakhīṃ prati kayācidvyajyate
GK16visa02cu:1214: atra vaktryā madanavihvalatādinā vaiśiṣṭyam, vākyasya tathābhūtānubhūyamānavicchittiyuktatvena
GK16visa02cu:1216: vakulakuñjādinā; kālasya vasantavattvena; evameṣāṃ vaiśiṣṭyena vakroktyā vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ sphuṭameva /
GK16visa02cu:1217: (vi, na) kālo madhuriti--sakhīṃ prati proṣitabharttṛkāyā uktiriyam /
GK16visa02cu:1220: īdṛśavyaṅgyabodhe kelīvanīrūpasya tatpradarśanena karaṇīyājajñāsārthakavākyasya tat vaktryā uddīpakapradarśanalabdhaśṛṅgāraprakaraṇasya madhurūpakālasya ca vailakṣaṇyaṃ hetuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1223: “niḥ śeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanataṭaṃ nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharo netre dūramanañjane pulakitā tanvī taveyaṃ tanuḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1224: mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame vāpīṃ snātumito gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikam”
GK16visa02cu:1226: (vi, pa) niḥ śeṣeti--upanāyakamānetuṃ preṣitāṃ yuvatiṃ tenaiva
GK16visa02cu:1227: upabhuktāmāgatyāsau matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti pratārayantīṃ dūtīṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ solluṇṭhanoktiriyam
GK16visa02cu:1228: he matprārthanayāpi nāyāta iti mithyāvādini ! dūti ! bāndhavajanasya mama ajñātakāmapīḍāgame itaḥ strātuṃ vāpīṃ gatāsi na punastasyādhamasyāntikaṃ gatāsi /
GK16visa02cu:1233: netre ca dūramatiśayaṃ yathā syāttathānañjane jāte iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1235: tathā iyaṃ tanvī kṛśā tava tanuḥ pulakitā; strānaśaityāt jātapulakā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1238: ( lo, ā) niḥ śeṣeti--taṭaṃ samīpaṃ, sa ca samaprayo deśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1239: tatra candanaṃ niḥ śeṣacyutaṃ; cūcukādiṣu ca śeṣam; adharo
GK16visa02cu:1240: nirmṛṣṭarāgaḥ; dūrabhanañjane nikaṭe tu sāñjane; añjanasya kvacit kvacidavaśeṣaḥ sūcitaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1241: iyaṃ tanuḥ cirakāle 'pi strāne idānīṃ pulakitā; tanvī kṣāmā ca /
GK16visa02cu:1243: atra tadantikameva rantuṃ gatāsīti viparītalakṣaṇayā lakṣyam /
GK16visa02cu:1244: tasya ca rantumiti vyaṅgyaṃ pratipādyaṃ dūtīvaiśiṣṭyādbodhyate /
GK16visa02cu:1249: teṣāṃ ratikāryyatvenaita pratītirhi-candanādhararagayoścyutimārjanābhyāṃ, strāne tvanayoḥ kṣālanamevoktaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:1250: tathā dūraṃ cumbanaspṛṣṭaṃ netraprāntabhāgaṃ prāpya anañjane strāne tu samastanetrasyaivānañjanatvamuktaṃ syāt /
GK16visa02cu:1251: tathā candanacyutimahinmā grīṣmakālaprāptau pulakena ca tadānīṃ snānena pulakābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1254: atra gamanaṃ lakṣaṇayeti yaduktaṃ tat kāvyaprakāśakārasyāsammatam /
GK16visa02cu:1256: tathā hi na gatāsītyasya kāvyatvena tatra lakṣaṇāyā evābhāvāt /
GK16visa02cu:1257: taduktaṃ “vākye na śaktirnavā lakṣaṇeti'; padalakṣaṇā tu na
GK16visa02cu:1260: yadi ca vākye 'pi lakṣaṇā svīkriyate tathāpi na lakṣaṇā /
GK16visa02cu:1262: tathā hi candanacyavanādīnāṃ prathamaṃ snānakāryyatvenaiva pratītyā bādhānavatārāt /
GK16visa02cu:1264: atra ca vyañjanāyāḥ pravṛtternatu lakṣaṇāyā eva /
GK16visa02cu:1270: pūrvatra prathamaṃ bādhyatayā khyātau pratītau abhidhaiva tvityanena tatra lakṣaṇāyā abhāvāt
GK16visa02cu:1274: (lo, i) eṣāṃ ca padārthānāṃ vāpīsnānaviruddhānāmanusandhānādeva vāpīsnānābhāvamātrasya prarohābhāvena tadantikaṃ na gatāsītyatra
GK16visa02cu:1275: viparītalakṣaṇayā gatāsīti lakṣyate ntumityataḥ pūrvaṃ tena saheti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1279: atra balākāyā nispandatvena viśvastatvam, tenāsya deśasya vijanatvam, ataḥ saṃketasthānametaditi kayāpi saṃnihitaṃ pracchannakāmukaṃ pratyucyate /
GK16visa02cu:1282: (vi, ba) saṅketasthānamupanāyake darśayantyā dūtyā uktiriyam--ua iti
GK16visa02cu:1290: tathā ca dyotyata ityatra dyotanaṃ sāmājikairvyañjanayā budhyata iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1291: nāyakena tu balākāpradarśanarūpāt vaktryā vailakṣaṇyāt saṅketasthalaṃ vyañjanayā budhyate
GK16visa02cu:1305: atra naiṣyati, api tarhi eṣyatyeveti kākkā vyajyate--
GK16visa02cu:1313: naiṣyatīti---api tveṣyatyevetyarthaḥ kākkā vyajyate iti--kākkāḥ paraṃ nañarthopasthāpanānna eṣyati eṣyatyevetyevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1324: atra saṃdhyā saṃketakāla iti paṅmanimīlanādiceṣṭayā kayāciddyotyate /
GK16visa02cu:1328: hasatā netreṇārpitaṃ sthāpitam ākūtaṃ bhāvo yatra tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā līlāpadmaṃ nimīlitamityarthaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1334: tatra vācyārthasya vyañjanā yathā-”kālo madhuḥ-” ityādi /
GK16visa02cu:1345: śabdārthayorekasya vyañjakatve taditaraḥ sahakārī satu avarjanīyasānnidhimātreṇāvasthitaḥ
GK16visa02cu:1346: kintu yatra yacchaktirutkaṭā tatra tanmūlo vyañjakatvavyapadeśaḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1352: (vi, ya) vaktṛboddhavyādidaśavaiśiṣṭyāt yār'tho vyañjanoktā, sā vyañjakārthatrauvidhyāt trividhetyāha--arthānāṃ vyañjakārthānām /
GK16visa02cu:1361: tātparyārthaṃ tadarthaṃ ca vākyaṃ tadvodhakaṃ pare // VisSd_2.20 //
GK16visa02cu:1363: (vi, ra) na kevalaṃ vācyāditrividha eva śabdasyārtho 'pi tu vācyāditrayabhinnaḥ padārthasaṃsargo 'pi śabdārthastadbodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāha--kiṃ cetyādinā /
GK16visa02cu:1366: tadarthaṃ tasyā vṛtterviṣayarūpamarthaṃ tātparyyārthaṃ saṃsargarūpaṃ tadvodhakaṃ ca vākyamityāhuḥ
GK16visa02cu:1367: abhidhāyā ekaikapadārthabodhanavirāmādvākyārtharūpasya padārthānvayasya bodhikā tātpaya nāma vṛttiḥ /
GK16visa02cu:1374: abhihitānvayavādināṃ naiyāyikānāṃ padena padārthe 'bhihite smārite tadanvayabodho vākyādeva iti /
GK16visa02cu:1377: ihi sāhityārpaṇo vākyasvarūpanirūpaṇo nāma dvitīyaḥ paricchedaḥ /
